text: Louis Victor Pierre Raymond, (7th) Duke of Broglie, (August 15, 1892 in Dieppe â€“ March 19, 1987 in Louveciennes) was a French physicist. He discovered that electrons are similar to both particles and waves. He won the Nobel Prize in Physics in 1929.
